Name: Showdown Challenge
Desc:
Attacks and taunts up to 6 enemies, and prevents them from colliding into you.
Increases EXP Obtained and Item Drop Rate from the taunted enemies. This effect is halved for Boss monsters.
When the talisman explodes, a Shuriken of Darkness is created to attack nearby enemies. Shuriken of Darkness attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

Desc.Old:
Attacks and taunts up to 6 enemies, and prevents them from colliding into you. Increases EXP and item rewards from the taunted enemies. This effect is halved for Boss monsters.
When the talisman explodes, a Shuriken of Darkness is created to attack nearby enemies. Shuriken of Darkness attacks do not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Desc.New:
Attacks and taunts up to 6 enemies, and prevents them from colliding into you.
Increases EXP Obtained and Item Drop Rate from the taunted enemies. This effect is halved for Boss monsters.
When the talisman explodes, a Shuriken of Darkness is created to attack nearby enemies. Shuriken of Darkness attacks do not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 50 and consumes 3 throwing stars
Attacks up to 6 enemies at 708% damage 2 times. Creates 6 Shurikens and taunts them
Taunted enemies cannot be collided with. EXP and item rewards +5% for 140 sec. (Halved for Boss monsters)
Shuriken attacks 6 times at 24% damage. Final Damage is reduced by 50% when one enemy is hit by multiple Shurikens. Damage +200% when attacking normal monsters.
Regeneration Cooldown after generating Shuriken: 5 sec.
H.New:
Cost: 50 MP and 3 throwing stars.
Taunts and attacks up to 6 enemies at 708% Damage 2 times.
For 140 sec., taunted enemies don't collide and increase EXP Obtained and Item Drop Rate +5%. (Effect halved for Boss monsters)
Afterward, creates 6 shurikens that attack at 24% Damage 6 times.
If a single enemy is hit by multiple shurikens, Final Damage -50% for each subsequent shuriken after the first one. Normal Monster Damage +200%.
Shuriken Cooldown: 5 sec.
